lead_paragraph: Philadelphia Flyers goaltender Antero Niittymaki will be out indefinitely with a left-hip injury, General Manager Bob Clarke said. Niittymaki, 26, was injured in practice yesterday. If surgery is needed, Niittymaki would be out six to eight weeks.
snippet: Philadelphia Flyers goaltender Antero Niittymaki will be out indefinitely with a left-hip injury, General Manager Bob Clarke said. Niittymaki, 26, was injured in practice yesterday. If surgery is needed, Niittymaki would be out six to eight weeks.
